00053 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00054 struct LessThanNode
00055 {
00062     bool operator()(const Node<SPACE_DIM> * const &n1, const Node<SPACE_DIM> * const &n2) const
00063     {
00064         return (n1->GetIndex() < n2->GetIndex() );
00065     }
00066 };
00067 
00071 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM, unsigned PROBLEM_DIM>
00072 class AbstractBoundaryConditionsContainer : boost::noncopyable
00073 {

00075 
00077     typedef typename std::map< const Node<SPACE_DIM> *, const AbstractBoundaryCondition<SPACE_DIM>*, LessThanNode<SPACE_DIM> >
00078         DirichletMapType;
00079     DirichletMapType* mpDirichletMap[PROBLEM_DIM]; 
00082     typedef typename std::map< const Node<SPACE_DIM> *, const AbstractBoundaryCondition<SPACE_DIM>*, LessThanNode<SPACE_DIM> >::const_iterator
00083         DirichletIteratorType;
00084     DirichletIteratorType mDirichIterator; 
00087     bool mHasDirichletBCs;
00088 
00090     bool mCheckedAndCommunicatedIfDirichletBcs;
00091

00094

00104                                             = std::set<const AbstractBoundaryCondition<SPACE_DIM>*>());
